file.name: covid19_openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.1.0
  title: COVID-19 APIs
  description: Here you can find documentation for COVID-19 REST API.
servers:
  - description: Covid-19 statistic serverless API
    url: https://api-cov19.now.sh/
paths:
  /api:
    get:
      tags: ["Data for all countries"]
      description: Returns information about all countries
      operationId: getCovidinAllCountries
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of countries with all informtion included.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Countries"
                }
  /api/v1/countries/list/:
    get:
      tags: ["Countries list"]
      description: List of all countries with COVID-19 cases
      operationId: getCountryList
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Default response with array of strings
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/CountryInfo"
                }
        '500':
          description: Error message.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Error"
  /api/countries/{country}:
    get:
      tags: ["Data for country"]
      summary: Get a country by name
      operationId: getCountryByName
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: country
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: String Name of the country to get
      description: Returns information about country. Pass country name as a parameter. Country name is case insensitive. For example â€“ https://api-cov19.now.sh/api/countries/netherlands
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of countries with all informtion included.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Country"
        '500':
          description: Error message.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  schemas:
    CountryInfo:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
    Countries:
      type: object
      properties:
        confirmed:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              "Province/State":
                type: string
              Lat:
                type: string
              Long:
                type: string
              "d/mm/yy":
                type: string
        death:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              "Province/State":
                type: string
              Lat:
                type: string
              Long:
                type: string
              "d/mm/yy":
                type: string
        recovered:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              "Province/State":
                type: string
              Lat:
                type: string
              Long:
                type: string
              "d/mm/yy":
                type: string
    Country:
      type: object
      properties:
        country:
          type: string
        dates:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        confirmed:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
        deaths:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
        recovered:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
